snippet: Each recurrence of cancer seems more dire, and yet after each, Stuart Scott has returned to his high-profile work at ESPN, ensuring that his private fight also has become a very public one.
abstract: ESPN anchor Stuart Scott is once again battling cancer that has returned three times since 2007; each recurrence has seemed more dire, yet Scott has met condition with fierce resistance, keeping his body in top shape; Scott's high-profile job, and notable absences from it, have ensured that his private fight has become a public one.
lead_paragraph: Each recurrence of cancer seems more dire, and yet after each, Stuart Scott has returned to his high-profile work at ESPN, ensuring that his private fight also has become a very public one.

headline.seo: ESPN Anchor’s Private Battle With Cancer Becomes a Public One
